author: A. Morgan Rider
comment: Set for every 15minute reminders, will update that part after testing,  otherwise: BEST  APP for STAYING HYDRATED!!!  (I just purchased the pro version)  which says a lot coming from me, I try many and I'm very fussy . Samsung Note 3, Android, love it!

reply.author: Cynan Rhodes
reply.content:
Thanks Morgan, we take your word :)
Cheers, Martin

comment: I really liked the free app & after a month decided to upgrade to the Premium version which has a little more oomph & no ads. Unfortunately, none of my water data transferred over from the free app to Premium. I've already done the back & forth e-mails with Aqualert trying to figure out what the issue is & if it can be fixed (& yes, I followed Aqualert's instructions). I'm hoping they get it straightened out soon because it's a nice looking, easy to use app that's not too fussy...  Update 02/14/18: Still haven't received a response from Aqualert to figure out how to transfer the data from the free app to Premium, so I just went ahead & did it manually. It IS time consuming, but not too, too long if you don't have much to input. Still 3 stars until I've had more time to use the Premium app, but again, it's a nice looking app...much cleaner looking than other water tracking apps & simple to use...we'll see how it does in terms of other glitches...

reply.author: Cynan Rhodes
reply.content: Hi! We are working on it!

author: Annitra Boodoo
comment: I have paid for Pro but I'm still  sometimes receiving loud ads after I make a log of consuming water. This is undesirable if I'm logging that I've drunk water at work during a meeting for instance. I've been embarrassed more than once by the loud auto play ads that seem geared toward kids anyway and not ads for things I'd even be interested in.   **EDIT** Based on the extremely prompt response I've upgraded my rating from 2 to 5 stars. I was using the wrong version of the app as indicated below.

reply.author: Cynan Rhodes
reply.content: Hi Annitra, in the premium version you shouldnt recive any ads at all. Please emails us to contactus@aqualertapp.com to solve the problem and please check that you are using the Aqualert version with the golden circle on the icon.

author: Victoria Darlington
comment: Really glad I've installed this app it's helped me tons to keep my water intake up. I wish I could add all the other drinks I consume so I would know if I should still be drinking the same amount of water or more, this would be a good touch. All the friends I've shown it to were surprised that I could only enter water. I now realise that I can enter other drinks, the only thing I can't enter is alcohol and as I'm a frequent glass of wine drinker it would greatly benefit me and I'm sure others to be aware of how much extra water needs to be drunk. Apart from that the app is wonderful and I've been using it for over a 2 months and have recommended it to many people. Thanks again, please do consider alcohol as most people do have a drink or two of an evening!!!

reply.author: Cynan Rhodes
reply.content: So nice to hear Victoria, we will add what you requested soon

author: Denise Scott
comment: I have a permanent ileostomy, meaning, I no longer have large intestines. So, it is crucial for my health to intake the proper amount of water daily. I gave ALL five stars bc the Aqualert app helped me do what I thought to be IMPOSSIBLE, drink the proper amount of water needed in a timely manner daily. It helps meet my goals in fun, informative and accurate ways. From the water notifications sounds, to the funny motivational background choices, self-start/end timers, the FYI reasons you must meet your water goals etc.! Aqualert app has turned my "I have to drink water today"😩 attitude into "I can't wait to drink my water goal today"! 🤗

reply.author: Cynan Rhodes
reply.content: Hi Denise is great to hear cases like yours where make the life easier.  if you need anything let us know. If you can try our new app iEatWell will be great for us. Cheers Martin
